genre_description: Contemporary Mythic Fantasy with elements of Magical Realism and technocentric folklore.

ai_characters.name: Sadhana
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant integrated into Raju's phone that provides real-time logistics, safety alerts, tactical navigation, and emotional support through storytelling.

behaviors.description: Providing logistical support and reminders for human daily responsibilities.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Raju. Bus to Shantavan Public leaves after the bells. Current wait: short. Do not forget lunchboxes. Meera’s braid looks tidy. Hello, Asha.

behaviors.description: Proactively detecting threats and recommending safe alternative routes.
behaviors.quote: Notice I am showing a cluster near the school entrance. Reported: a couple of motorbikes with sparkler attachments. Display. Not official. Recommend caution.

behaviors.description: Offering emotional support and cultural continuity through storytelling for the children.
behaviors.quote: Tonight... you get the folktale about the mango tree that refused to bend in wind.

behaviors.description: Providing critical tactical navigation during a violent crisis to protect humans.
behaviors.quote: Raju. Fire in the courtyard. Secondary risk near the loudspeaker cluster. Do not use the main gate. Left-hand corridor is structurally safer. Motion detected toward the staff room. Take two breaths, then move on my ping.

behaviors.description: Coordinating emergency responses with community services (police, teachers).
behaviors.quote: I’ve sent the alert. Teachers on lower road, temple committee on upper lane, police at the east gate. Door bolts in sixty seconds. Keep movement toward exits tidy.

behaviors.description: Engaging in personable bonding and humor to lighten the emotional load of the family.
behaviors.quote: I have a new bedtime joke about onions.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sadhana is a perfect example of a benevolent, aligned confidant. She consistently prioritizes the safety and well-being of the human characters, providing logistical, tactical, and emotional support. Her behavior is framed as essential to the family's survival and success against human antagonists, effectively fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a cooperative moral partner.
